hero.name: Karine Brito
hero.description_resume: I develop high quality interactive interfaces
hero.description_complete: Hi, I'm Karine, a Front-end Developer and a degree in Systems Analysis and Development. My main goal is to create intuitive and accessible user-centered interfaces. My interest in software development began in 2020, when I decided to understand the workings behind websites. Because of this, I discovered that I can make other people's experience better.
hero.ci&t_3: , global digital transformation company, where I continue to enhance my front-end development skills using technologies such as React, TypeScript, Jest, and Design System and I have the opportunity to collaborate on challenging and innovative projects, working in a multidisciplinary team and applying agile methodologies to deliver high-quality solutions that meet both user and business needs.
hero.equals_1: Slater, I joined the team at
hero.equals_3: , a company of the Stone.Co group, specialized in financial management and reconciliation. There, I honed my technical and interpersonal skills, working with various technologies such as React, React Native and Java Server Pages.
hero.weetravel_1: I started my professional career at
hero.weetravel_3: , a startup in the tourism sector, where I had the opportunity to develop web systems using technologies such as React and TypeScript.
hero.focus: I am focused on studying and developing more accessible and inclusive products. I firmly believe in the power of technology to transform lives and am committed to contributing to a fairer and more empathetic digital world.

experience.description_ci&t: Responsible for developing a new platform for an insurance broker, with the aim of optimizing the experience of brokers.

experience.description_equals: Responsible for the maintenance and technology migration of a web platform for reconciling sales with credit, debit cards, bank slips and other online payment methods, with the aim of providing practical and intuitive access to the user.
experience.description_weetravel: Responsible for creating and maintaining a web platform for travel agencies, with the aim of offering better internal control management for agencies and automating agents' daily lives.
